metadata.title: CVE-2024-34155 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Calling any of the Parse functions on Go source code which contains deeplynested literals can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-34155` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.17 - 1.17.13-3ubuntu1.3
golang-1.17-go - 1.17.13-3ubuntu1.3
golang-1.17-src - 1.17.13-3ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.2
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.2
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.13-3ubuntu1.3').
golang-1.18 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1.2').
golang-1.20 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.21 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
